author: casarsa
body:
#### PR description:

The obsolete and unused code has been removed from the SimFastTiming and RecoLocalFastTime packages, i.e. the code relative to the BTL design with scintillator tiles and the simple FTL device.


#### PR validation:

The purged code has been tested with the WF 23207.0 in CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-02-09-2300. The results of MTD simulation and local reconstruction are unaffected.
title: MTD simulation and local reconstruction: code cleaning
